comments:
Environment:
Latest from HEAD as of this bug timestamp.
Clean agent data.
Metadata repo generated yesterday evening.

- I created Profile Foo.
- I created a second profile, SDK.
- I installed eclipse 3.3.1 and the update UI into SDK.
- I went to the install folder and ran the newly provisioned SDK, installed the releng tools, restarted, saw that they were there...

Now, I shut down the admin UI and restarted it.
I could see that the SDK profile contained all of the things I expected it to contain.
Then I decided to install the eclipse 3.3.1 sdk into the other profile, Foo.
While doing so, I get a bunch of Artifact repository out of synch errors, like this:

Artifact repository out of synch. Overwriting c:\prov\equinox.prov\agentData\artifactRepository\plugins\org.mortbay.jetty.source_5.1.11.v200706111724.jar

and then I get these errors:

Found the problem. The download cache was not being restored using the repository factory, so its index was empty.  Patch to follow.
